title: The Strongest Hokage - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Academy   Age Progression   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Bullying   Cheats   Cultivation   Discrimination   Eye Powers   Fanfiction   Fast Cultivation   Fast Learner   Handsome Male Lead   Harsh Training   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Ninjas   Overpowered Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Special Abilities   Sudden Strength Gain   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong

description:
The Gura Gura no Mi is known as the strongest fruit in the world of one piece.

In Naruto world, the blood limit would grant the strongest power for those ninjas. But what if the Gura Gura no Mi is found in the world of Naruto And after it is eaten it will be like a blood limit power.

Well, the MC just took that Fruit.

This story begins before the second Ninja war by two years.>
